alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:18PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL FOREST AND SOUTHWESTERN FLORENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 418 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Headwaters Wilderness, or 16 miles north of Crandon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Popple River around 430 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Morgan Lake Campground, Newald, Lost Lake Campground, Long Lake, Popple River Headwaters Natural Area, and Bastile Lake Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
